title: Lent 2020 Week 4 with Lisa Harper
description:
There’s no one quite like Bible teacher and author Lisa Harper. She joins Raechel and Amanda to dig deep into week four of our Lent reading plan. Together they talk about the soft, gooey center of the book of Jeremiah, what happens when suffering collides with joy, and why Christians ought to be Easter-people all year round.

Read with us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 4 of the She Reads Truth Lent reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com.
